ygData.subject: spells
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, if you are not a dark elf, you will notice a DRASTIC difference between infravision and ultravision ;) even so, 49 is quite late to be getting this spell.
ygData.messageBody:
yes, if you are not a dark elf, you will notice a DRASTIC difference between
infravision and ultravision ;) even so, 49 is quite late to be getting this
spell.

also, last night i found that it IS possible for a solo lvl 40 sk to get to
the undead knight in najena ;p you just have to be very patient, and willing
to use your HT up (probably on rathyl's reincarnate). just be sure you only
pull everything one at a time rather than rushing into the rooms..

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
